biotools.summary: COVIDep provides an up-to-date set of B-cell and T-cell epitopes that can serve as potential vaccine targets for SARS-CoV-2. The identified epitopes are experimentally-derived from the 2003 SARS virus and have a close genetic match with the available SARS-CoV-2 sequences. COVIDep is flexible and user-friendly, comprising an intuitive graphical interface and interactive visualizations.
